name: Sparingly
description:
You find yourself stuck in a pitch-black maze filled with monsters. You're only equipped with a double barrel shotgun, and a few flares. To get out of here, you must find a key to unlock the door. Using your limited resources, navigate the maze and make your way out. Be wary about where you shoot, though...

Sparingly is a small game I made based on a concept I came up with on the fly. It was made in about two days total, and it's not perfect. I might add more to it one day.

CONTROLSWASDMoveMouse
Look (There is no vertical looking)
Left Click
FireRReloadFFlare
